item.description: The Wild Colonial promises to be a good place to gather to hoist a pint of Guinness or slug of Jameson on the 17th. It's got that old world atmosphere, but isn't a destination Irish pub that will doubtless be a mob scene. There is a fair amount of space and that's good because I like to engage in a bit of 'craic' while throwing darts and communing with my forebears from the Northern Ireland town of Enniskillen. Later on, the fairly central location may appeal to those wandering in search of greener pastures or the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.
item.how_to_find_us: Christopher is hosting this one - look at his picture!
item.name: Celebrate St. Patrick's Day!
